cause.description:
*The Breast Cancer 3-Day is a 60-mile walk over the course of three days. Net proceeds benefit Susan G. Komen for the Cure and the National Philanthropic Trust, funding important breast cancer research, education, screening, and treatment.
*Join us! The San Diego Greek Community has their very own team, and its a great opportunity to bond with other Greeks while raising money and awareness for this amazing cause
*For more information, check out the3day.org AND if you're interested in registering, join the team "Support Sisters": San Diego Greeks
*Join this group if you're interested in participating, or if you just want to support the team or those participating!
*Kari's Webpage: http://www.the3day.org/sandiego07/karigohd
*Debbye's Webpage: http://www.the3day.org/sandiego07/debbyerose
1. A cure for Breast Cancer MUST be found!
cause.mission: Raise money for Breast Cancer Research by participating in the San Diego 3-Day Walk!!!
cause.name: 3 Day Breast Cancer Walk: San Diego
